name: Runway Story
description:
Dress up characters with your own designs in Runway Story! Play fashionable match-3 puzzles and decorate fancy outfits for fashion wonder twins, Jamie and Jerome. From charming and cute clothing to fun and funky costumes, fashion is what you make it through matching fashion puzzles.
Let's switch, match colorful puzzles and design fancy fashion items like gowns, dresses and even accessories! Travel the world with the fashion twins, stopping at interesting locations like comic stores, Marina Beach, and even the circus! What are you waiting for?! Discover a fashionable runway story of your own!

Game Features:
• Stylish and fun puzzle game! What could be better?!
Match puzzles, customize your look, and visit unique locations while learning about all the interesting characters you'll meet along the way.
• Adorable Characters: Around the village, you can meet the most charming people through stages. Design creative clothes and give your neighbors an instant makeover!
• Challenging Match-3 Puzzle Levels: This is not just one of casual puzzle games. Use fantastic items to help you break through exciting and challenging levels! It's a blast!
• Great Locations: From Fashion School to Runway Hall, Jaime and Jerome's adventure is nonstop excitement!
• Tell Your Friends: You can't keep this creativity contained! Take pictures and send your charming designs to your friends.

Runway Story is free to play, though some in-game items can also be purchased for real money. You can turn off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases in your device’s settings.

Support & Community

The game may crash on devices that don't meet these requirements.
